# ----Solution----

n = int(input())
a = sorted([int(i) for i in input().split()])

set1 = set(a)

if len(set1) == len(a):
    print(len(a))
else:
    if len(set1) == 1:
        print(len(a) + 1)
    else:
        count = 0
        for i in range(len(a)):
            if a[i] != i + 1:
                count += 1
        print(len(a) - count)

n = int(input())
a = sorted([int(i) for i in input().split()])

set1 = set(a)

if len(set1) == len(a):
    print(len(a))
else:
    if len(set1) == 1:
        print(len(a) + 1)
    else:
        count = 0
        for i in range(len(a)):
            if a[i] != i + 1:
                count += 1
        print(len(a) - count)
import sys
lines = sys.stdin.readlines()

n = int(lines[0])
weights = [int(i) for i in lines[1].split()]
weights.sort()
count = 1
prev = weights[0]
for i in range(1, n):
  if weights[i] != prev:
    count += 1
  prev = weights[i]
print(count)

n = int(input())
a = sorted([int(i) for i in input().split()])

set1 = set(a)

if len(set1) == len(a):
    print(len(a))
else:
    if len(set1) == 1:
        print(len(a) + 1)
    else:
        count = 0
        for i in range(len(a)):
            if a[i] != i + 1:
                count += 1
        print(len(a) - count)

import sys

lines = sys.stdin.read().splitlines()

n = int(lines[0])
weights = [int(i) for i in lines[1].split()]

weights.sort()

count = 1
prev = weights[0]
for i in range(1, n):
    if weights[i] != prev:
        count += 1
    prev = weights[i]

print(count)
